snippet: Ties in the group stage of the European Championships will not be broken on goal differential, initially. The first tiebreaker is head-to-head results between two teams.
abstract: Tie-breaking procedure in the group stage of the European Championships soccer tournament is examined.
lead_paragraph: Ties in the group stage of the European Championships will not be broken on goal differential, initially. The first tiebreaker is head-to-head results between two teams.

headline.seo: Euro 2012: Goal Differential Is Not First Tiebreaker
